head.supplied: 5th of April [189]2. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ With reference to the set of the publications of the Anthropological Society of Berlin forwarded by you in June last ¶ as an exchange for a copy of the "Acacias" and ...

div.p: No 332, pp. 423-4, unit 19, VPRS 802 Librarian's outward registered correspondence, 1864-1957, VA 913 Public Library of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.

With reference to the set of the publications of the Anthropological Society of Berlin forwarded by you in June last
See M to T. Bride, 5 June 1891 (in this edition as 91-06-05a), T. Bride to M, 19 June 1891 (in this edition as 91-06-19a), and M to T. Bride, 20 June 1891. as an exchange for a copy of the "Acacias" and the "Eucalyptographia",
Each was issued in parts and not as a complete volume. For the publishing history see, for 'Acacias', B87.13.04 and B88.13.01; and for 'Eucalyptographia', B79.13.11, B80.13.14, B82.13.17 and B84.11.02. you will remember that I advised you that there was a copy of the publications of the Society in the Library and that a second copy would be of no use. It was decided that the set was to be removed from the Library; this has not yet been done and I shall be glad if you will be good enough to send a messenger for the parcel as early as practicable.

div.p: I have the honour to be,
